docs.title: 💰 Micro-Loan Eligibility App
docs.text: Welcome to the Micro-Loan Eligibility App documentation! This app helps Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) check their loan eligibility using AI-powered analysis of financial data.

docs.title: 📚 Contents
docs.text:
• Getting started Instructions – How to install and run the app
  • Usage Guide – How to upload data and interact with the chat assistant
  • Team – Meet the people behind the app
  • FAQ – Frequently asked questions

docs.title: 🌟 Features
docs.text:
• 📤 Secure file upload – Upload your financial CSV data safely
  • 🤖 AI-driven recommendations – Get advice on whether to take a loan, a smaller loan, or not at all
  • 💬 Interactive chat assistant – Ask questions and get guidance in real time
  • 📝 Session-based chat history – Keep track of your conversation during your session

docs.title: 🚀 Getting Started
docs.text: To get started, go to the Setup Instructions page to install and run the app. Once installed, you can upload your data and start checking loan eligibility instantly!

docs.title: 🚀 Getting Started
docs.text: Welcome! This page will guide you through accessing and using the Micro-Loan Eligibility App.

docs.title: 1️⃣ Access the App
docs.text:
• Open your browser and go to the web app URL: [Your App URL]

  • You will see the login page.

docs.title: 2️⃣ Register an Account
docs.text:
• If you don’t have an account, click Register.
  • Provide your details (name, email, password) and submit.
  • Check your email for a confirmation link (if enabled).

docs.title: 3️⃣ Login
docs.text:
• Enter your email and password on the login page.
  • Click Login to enter the dashboard.

docs.title: 4️⃣ Start Using the App
docs.text:
• Once logged in, you can:
  • 📤 Upload your financial CSV data
  • 💬 Chat with the AI assistant to get loan eligibility recommendations

  • 📝 Review past session advice if you return to the app

  • The AI assistant will guide you step-by-step and give recommendations:

  • ✅ Take the loan
  • ⚖️ Take a smaller loan
  • ❌ Do not take a loan

docs.title: 5️⃣ Tips
docs.text:
• Keep your financial CSV files ready for quick uploads
  • Ask questions in the chat assistant if you’re unsure about recommendations
  • Your session history will be available as long as you stay logged in

docs.title: 👥 Meet the Team
docs.text: The Micro-Loan Eligibility App is developed by a dedicated team of experts, working together to help SMEs make smarter financial decisions.

docs.title: Our Team Members
docs.text:
• Ebenezer Wakyendo – Team Lead & Project Manager 🏆 Oversees the project, coordinates the team, and ensures smooth delivery of all features.

  • Shalom Kinuthia – Finance Expert 💹 Provides financial expertise, validates loan eligibility logic, and ensures accurate recommendations.

  • Faith Kimani – Developer 💻 Implements the app functionality, handles AI integration, and ensures a seamless user experience.

docs.title: 🚀 Our Mission
docs.text:
To provide Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) with AI-powered insights for micro-loan eligibility, helping them make data-driven financial decisions quickly and securely.

💡 Fun Fact: Our team loves blending AI with real-world impact, aiming to make financial tools accessible to every SME owner!

docs.title: 💬 Usage Guide
docs.text: This page explains how to use the Micro-Loan Eligibility App to check your loan eligibility.

docs.title: 1️⃣ Dashboard Overview
docs.text:
After logging in, you will see the dashboard with two main sections:

  • Chat Assistant – Interact with the AI to ask questions about your loan eligibility
  • Data Upload – Upload your SME financial data (CSV files) for analysis

docs.title: 2️⃣ Uploading Your Financial Data
docs.text:
1. Click on the Upload Data section.
  2. Select your financial CSV file from your device.
  3. Click Upload.
  4. The app will confirm successful upload:

Make sure your CSV contains accurate financial data for the best AI recommendations.

docs.title: 3️⃣ Interacting with the Chat Assistant
docs.text:
1. Go to the Chat Assistant section.
  2. Type your question or request in the chat box, for example:
  3. "Should I take a loan of $5,000?"
  4. "What’s my recommended loan amount?"
  5. Press Enter or click Send.
  6. The AI assistant will analyze your uploaded data and respond with advice:
  7. ✅ Take the loan
  8. ⚖️ Take a smaller loan
  9. ❌ Do not take a loan

docs.title: 4️⃣ Tips for Effective Use
docs.text:
• Ask clear, specific questions to get the best advice.
  • You can upload updated CSV files anytime to get new recommendations.
  • The chat session history is maintained as long as you stay logged in.

docs.title: 5️⃣ Example Workflow
docs.text:
1. Upload your financial CSV.
  2. Ask the AI: "Can I take a loan of $10,000?"
  3. The AI analyzes your data and replies: "⚖️ You should consider taking a smaller loan of $5,000."
  4. Adjust your loan request and ask follow-up questions.

💡 Pro Tip: The AI assistant can also explain why a particular recommendation was made — just ask in the chat!
